column2: Opens the list of courtier employment decisions.
Closes the list of courtier employment decisions.
Opens the list of race, item, trait, and war based decisions.
Closes the list of race, item, trait, and war based decisions.
Opens the list of family decisions, including hiding your relations, abdication and inheritance of items.
Closes the list of family decisions.
Opens the list of festival, fair and hunt decisions.
Closes the list of festival, fair and hunt decisions.
Decide on which dynasty you would like to join.
As a master smith you can forge your own items.
